data.name: AsyncAPI Online Conference
data.description: It all started like a crazy idea. Since we’re all confined at home due to the coronavirus pandemic, why not organizing a fully-remote online conference to meet each other and have some fun? We asked the community and the response was overwhelmingly positive. We had no choice! Time for some action!
